definitions: a large deep-bodied marine fish of warm seas, with tall dorsal and anal fins near the rear of the body and a very short tail.

notes.text: Family Molidae: three genera and several species, in particular the very large ocean sunfish (Mola mola), also commonly called mola mola

shortDefinitions: large deep-bodied marine fish of warm seas, with tall dorsal and anal fins near rear

definitions: a nest-building freshwater fish that is native to North America and popular in aquariums, e.g., the pumpkinseed.

notes.text: Several genera and species in the family Centrarchidae (the sunfish family). This family also includes sport fish such as the black basses, rock bass, bluegill, and crappies

shortDefinitions: nest-building freshwater fish that is native to North America and popular in aquaria
